data.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

data.price: Kanatsinda, ntibatumwe kugira ngo bazicungere.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ

data.price: Uno musi w’izuka rero, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo, baratwenga abagararije basuzuguritse mu bihano;
data.arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

data.price: Abemeramana bazoba bicaye ku bitanda vy'iteka bisharije biteye igomwe, baraba Imana yabo Allah hamwe n’ingabirano n’ivyiza bahawe;
data.arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

data.price: Bazovuga bati: “Mbega yemwe! Abagarariji boba bahembewe ivyo bari barakoze kw’isi?”.
data.arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

data.price: Igihe ijuru ryasadutse rigatabuka ku musi w’umuhero w’isi;
data.arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ

data.price: Rikumvira Imana yaryo Rurema Allah, kandi ritegerezwa nta kibuza;
data.arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ

data.price: Igihe n’isi yasanjwe;
data.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ

data.price: Igasohora abantu n’ubutare biri muri yo, igasigara igaragara;
data.arabic: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ

data.price: Ikumvira Imana yayo Rurema Allah, kandi itegerezwa nta kibuza.
data.arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ

data.price: Ewe muntu! Mu vy’ukuri wewe, ugana ku Mana Allah, ukita ku rutare mu bikorwa, vyaba vyiza canke bibi, kugeza aho uzohura n’Imana yawe Rurema Allah Ikabiguhembera.
data.arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

data.price: Uwo wese rero azohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe mu kuboko kwiwe kw’iburyo;
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ

data.price: Uyo, ni we azoharurirwa ibiharuro vyoroshe;
data.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا

data.price: Maze agasubira mu bantu biwe mu Bwami bw’ijuru akanyamuneza kamusya.
data.arabic: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا

data.price: Nayo uwuzohabwa igitabu c’ibikorwa vyiwe inyuma y’umugongo wiwe;
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

data.price: Uyo rero, azoheza yisabire urupfu;
data.arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا

data.price: Yinjire no mu muriro wama wegenyejwe;
data.arabic: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

data.price: Kuko mu vy’ukuri, yahorana akanyamuneza mu muryango wiwe akiri kw’isi, nta co yategekanirije uyu musi.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, yibaza ko atazosubira ku Mana yiwe Allah ngo Imuharurire.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ

data.price: Yobuzwa n’iki gusubira ku Mana Allah! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Yamye ari Nyenukubona, Yaramubona we n’ivyo yakora.
data.arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku bicu bitukura bugorovye!
data.arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ

data.price: No kw’ijoro n’ivyo rinyegeje!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

data.price: No ku kwezi iyo gukwijije umuco mu mfato!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ

data.price: Bantu! Ni ukuri muzohura n’ibihe bigoye bisumbasumbana[726].
data.arabic: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ
data.footnotes: [726] Umuntu wese aremwa mw’ima ry’intanga, rigahinduka amaraso avuze; nya maraso avuze agahinduka igihimba c’inyama; hanyuma nya gihimba c’inyama kigahuhirwamwo inkomoko y’ubuzima “Roho”. Yamara kuvuka akabaho, hanyuma agapfa, akazozuka, agashorerwa kw’iyegeranirizo ry’ibiremwa, hanyuma agaharurirwa.

data.price: Mbega, abantu babuzwa n’iki kwemera Imana Allah n’umusi w’iherezo, kandi basomerwa Aayah za Qor’ani zitomoye!
data.arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

data.price: N’iyo basomewe Qor’ani, ntibubamira Imana Allah ngo bemere amabwirizwa yayo.
data.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

data.price: Ahubwo abagararije bahakana Qor’ani bivuye inyuma, izuka n’iharurirwa ry’ibiremwa.
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ

data.price: Burya Imana Allah, ni Yo Izi neza ivyo bahishije mu mishaha yabo.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bashikirize rero inkuru y'incamugongo yo guhabwa ibihano bibabaza.
data.arabic: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

data.price: Ariko abantu bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barafise impembo idahera bagenewe mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru rifise inzira-ntasobwa z’izuba n’ukwezi!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ

data.price: No ku musi w’isango ryategekanijwe ry’izuka ry’ibiremwa!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ

data.price: No ku cabona cagiriza no ku wagirizwa[1]!
data.arabic: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ
data.footnotes: [1] Imana Allah, Irahira ku co Ishatse mu biremwa, nayo ikiremwa ntikirekuriwe kurahira kiretse kw’izina ry’Imana Allah, kurahira ku kitari Imana Allah, ni ibangikanyamana.

data.price: Harahonejwe abantu Benibinogo amahanga bimbiye abemeramana;
data.arabic: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ

data.price: Baraheza bavyatsamwo umuriro wenyegejwe;
data.arabic: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ

data.price: Igihe bari bicaye hambavu yavyo;
data.arabic: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ

data.price: Bitegereza ivyo bakorera abemeramana mu bihano.
data.arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

data.price: Nta na kimwe babahoye atari uko bemera Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Nyenugushimwa, Ishimwa ku mazina, amatazirano n’ibikorwa vyayo mu bihe vyose.
data.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

data.price: Ni Yo Nyenubwami, Igaba Ikaganza amajuru n’isi n’ibiri muri vyo vyose. Burya Imana Allah, Irazi ikintu ico ari co cose.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, abatoteje abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi mu kubaturira kugira bavavanure n’idini ry’Imana Allah, hanyuma ntibigaya ku Mana Allah ngo basabe imbabazi, abo bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, baranategekanirijwe ibihano vyo guturirwa.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe imirima itotahaye mu Bwami bw’ijuru, musi y’ibiti n’inyubakwa vyabwo hatemba inzuzi. Iyo, ni yo ntsinzi ihambaye.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, uguhana kw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah kurahambaye.
data.arabic: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose ata co Irinze gufatirako, kandi ni Yo Izobisubiza ubuzima, biheze bizuke.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

data.price: Ni na Yo Nyenimbabazi-ntangere ku bigaya, Nyenurukundo-ntangere ku batoni bayo.
data.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ

data.price: Nyenubuhangamo, Nyeniteka.
data.arabic: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ

data.price: Ikorana ubwira ico Ishatse, ntakiyinanira.
data.arabic: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, woba warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’ivyashikiye ingabo z’abagarariji!
data.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ

data.price: Ingabo za Firawuni n’iza Bene Thamuudi!
data.arabic: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ

data.price: Ahubwo abagararije Imana Allah bishinga kubandanya bahakana nk’ab’aho hambere.
data.arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ

data.price: Burya Imana Allah na Yo ku bushobozi n’ubumenyi vyayo, Irabakikuje ku mpande zose, nta buhungiro.
data.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ

data.price: Iyo Qor’ani bahakana, si amajambo y’abantu! Ahubwo, ni Qor’ani ntagatifu;
data.arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ

data.price: Yanditswe ku kibaho kibungabunzwe neza “Lawhu Mahfuudhw”.
data.arabic: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru no ku giserukajoro!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

data.price: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co igiserukajoro?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

data.price: Ni inyenyeri yakaka.
data.arabic: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

data.price: Ndarahiye kuri ivyo vyose, ko ata muntu n’umwe kiretse ko afise umubungabunzi azigama ibikorwa vyiwe mu bamalayika, kugira azobihemberwe!
data.arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

data.price: Umuntu ahakana izuka ry’ibiremwa rero, niyitegereze ico yaremwemwo, aheze amenye ko izurwa ryiwe ritagoye nk’iremwa ryiwe!
data.arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

data.price: Yaremwe mu mazi y’intanga asunitswe mu gitereko;
data.arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ

data.price: Avuye hagati y’uruti rw’umugongo w’umugabo n’igikiriza c’umugore.
data.arabic: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah Yaremye umuntu mu mazi y’intanga, Irashoboye no kumugarura inyuma yo gupfa Ikamusubiza ubuzima, akazuka.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ

data.price: Umusi amabanga azoshirwa ahabona, ivyiza bikamenyekana n’ibibi bikagaragara;
data.arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

data.price: Umuntu nta bubasha azoba afise bwo kwikingira ibihano, eka nta n’umutabazi amukura mu bihano azoronka.
data.arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijuru ryenimvura yisubiriza iyo amazi kw’isi ayaze agasubira mu kirere!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ

data.price: No kw’isi yiyata imigaga iyo ibiterwa bigondoye!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ

data.price: Ko mu vy’ukuri, iyo Qor’ani ari amajambo atandukanya ukuri n’ikinyoma;
data.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ

data.price: Si n’iyo kujajura.
data.arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, abahakana Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) hamwe na Qor’ani, bakoresha urwenge mu kurwanya ukuri.
data.arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا

data.price: Nanje Allah Nkabahinyura mu kugaragaza ukuri gushika aho gutsinda.
data.arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, tenyenyera abagarariji, ntiwihutire kubasabira ibihano, bihorere ubarindire gato, bazokwibonerako bidatevye.
data.arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا

data.price: Ninahaza izina ry’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere (uvuge uti: “Sub-haana Rabbiya l-A’laa”).
data.arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى

data.price: Yararemye ibiremwa, maze Iraringaniza indemo yavyo n’ibihimba; kimwe cose aho kigenewe, kibereye;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

data.price: Iraheza Irategekanya ivya nkenerwa vyose ku biremwa, Iranigisha kimwe cose ukuntu kivyikorako;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

data.price: Iranagisha n’uburagiro (ubwatsi);
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ

data.price: Hanyuma Irabukavya, busa n’urwatsi rutoto ruja kwirabura.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Twebwe Allah, Tuzokwigisha Qor’ani, ntuzoyibagira namba;
data.arabic: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

data.price: Kiretse ico Imana Allah Ishatse ko wibagira ku neza y’ibiremwa. Mu vy’ukuri, ni Yo Izi ibigaragara mu bikorwa no mu majambo n’ibinyegeje muri vyo.
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

data.price: Tuzokworohereza gukora ivyoroshe; nko kwihanganira ishikirizabutumwa no kworoherezwa amabwirizwa y’idini.
data.arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: Kubera ivyo rero, ibutsa abantu bawe warungitsweko gutumbera inzira igororotse, na canecane kwibutsa uwitezwe ko yibuka, nya kwibuka kukamugirira akamaro;
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

data.price: Hazokwibuka uwutinya ibihano vy'Imana Allah.
data.arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ

data.price: Uwaseserejwe n’ivyaha na we, azoheza yigire kure y’urwo rwibutso;
data.arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

data.price: Ari na we azokwinjira mu muriro udahera ukaze bihambaye;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ

data.price: Hanyuma ntazopfa muri wo ngo awuruhuke, eka ntazonawugiriramwo ubuzima buhimbaye.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri yaramaze gutsinda, umuntu yiyejeje amabi;
data.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

data.price: Akaninahaza n’izina ry’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, maze agasenga amasengesho-bwirizwa ku mwanya, arondera gushimwa na Yo.
data.arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

data.price: Bantu! Ahubwo rero, mushira imbere kurusha ubuzima bw’ibihendamaso vyo kw’isi;
data.arabic: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

data.price: Kandi ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwo bwiza gusumba, kandi bwamaho.
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, ivyo vyose mwadondaguriwe muri iki gisomwa, biri no mu Bitabu vy’aho hambere ya Qor’ani;
data.arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: Mu Mizingo y’Intumwa z’Imana Ibrahimu na Musa (za nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah).
data.arabic: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

data.price: Mbega Ntumwa y’Imana! Warashikiriwe n’inkuru y’umusi uhwikira ibiremwa!
data.arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ

data.price: Uwo musi, abagarariji bazosuzugurika bijirirwe mu maso kubera ibihano;
data.arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ

data.price: Bakore bita ku rutare, baruhe;
data.arabic: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ

data.price: Bazokwinjira mu muriro udahera, unyengetera cane;
data.arabic: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ

data.price: Banyweshwe mw’iriba ry’amazi asebura akaryimara;
data.arabic: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ

data.price: Nta mfungurwa bazohabwa atari amahwa yumye;
data.arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

data.price: Ntavyibusha namba eka ntanavuna n’inzara (ntanahembura) na gato.
data.arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ

data.price: Uwo musi rero, abemeramana bazorangwa n’akamwemwe mu maso;
data.arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ

data.price: Bashime mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ibikorwa vyabo bakoze kw’isi;
data.arabic: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ

data.price: Bazoba bari mu Bwami bw’ijuru bw’iteka;
data.arabic: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ

data.price: Ntibazokwumvamwo insaku n’amajambo ata co amaze;
data.arabic: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ

data.price: Harimwo iriba ry’amazi atemba;
data.arabic: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ

data.price: Harimwo n’ibitanda vy’icubahiro bihanitse;
data.arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ

data.price: N’ibirahuri bishinguwe neza, vyabategekanirijwe;
data.arabic: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ

data.price: N’imisego itondeshejwe neza;
data.arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ

data.price: N’ibisaswa vy’iteka bishashwe neza.
data.arabic: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ

data.price: Mbega yemwe, abagarariji ntibitegereza ingamiya ingene yaremwe!
data.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

data.price: N’ijuru ingene ryahanitswe, ata nkingi!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ

data.price: N’imisozi ingene yashimitswe!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ

data.price: N’isi ingene yashashwe, yagutse!
data.arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Kubera ivyo rero, Ibutsa abirengagiza ukuri, ko mu vy’ukuri wewe ujejwe kwibutsa gusa;
data.arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ

data.price: Wewe ntushinzwe kubahatira kwemera.
data.arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ

data.price: Ariko uwugenza umugongo, agatsimbatara mu kugarariza;
data.arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

data.price: Uyo, Imana Allah Izomuha ibihano ruhasha mu muriro.
data.arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, igaruka ryabo - nibazuka - ni iwacu Twebwe Allah;
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ

data.price: Hanyuma, nta nkeka ko ari Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kubaharurira ku musi w’impera.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku mutwenzi!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ

data.price: No ku majoro cumi ya mbere yo mu kwezi kwa 12, Dhul-Hijja!
data.arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ

data.price: No kuri bibiribibiri na nyahagwe!
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ

data.price: No kw’ijoro iyo rihise! Ko abahakanyi bazohanwa;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ

data.price: Ubwo muri ivyo, ntiharimwo indahiro ikwiye ku wufise ubwenge!
data.arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwabonye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize Bene Aadi igihe c’Intumwa Huudi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

data.price: Ubwoko bwa Iramu, beninguvu n’amazu maremare;
data.arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ

data.price: Nta baremwe nkabo mu bindi bisagara mu ngimba n’inguvu bari bafise.
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

data.price: Ntiwabonye n’ukuntu Yagize Bene Thamuudi, babaza amazu mu mabuye mu kabande igihe c’Intumwa Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah)!
data.arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ

data.price: Ntiwabonye kandi ukuntu Yagize Firawuni nyeningabo zatsimbataje ubwami bwiwe muri Misiri!
data.arabic: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

data.price: Abo bose, barimonogoje mu bugizi bwa nabi, mu bihugu vy’Imana Allah;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

data.price: Baraheza bakwiragizamwo ubwononyi bwinshi;
data.arabic: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ

data.price: Maze Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Ica Irabamanurira ibihano bibakwiye.
data.arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mu vy’ukuri Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ni Umureretsi w’ivyo bakoze, Iratenyenya ntiyibagira.
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ

data.price: Nayo umuntu, iyo Imana yiwe Rurema Allah Imugerageje, Ikamutera iteka ry’ubutegetsi canke ry’ubutunzi, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku butore bwiwe, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaranteye iteka nta ngere”.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ

data.price: Iyo naho Imugerageje, Ikamugerera mu vyo Imuronsa bimubeshaho, araheza akibaza ko biturutse ku gasuzuguro, agaca avuga ati: “Imana yanje Rurema Allah, Yaransuzuguye”.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ

data.price: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ariko guhabwa iteka guturuka ku kwumvira Imana Allah; gusuzugurwa na kwo, kugaturuka ku kugabitaniriza Imana Allah. Ahubwo rero mwebwe, ntimwitaho impfuvyi ngo muzifashe;
data.arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

data.price: Ntimunahimirizanya gufungurira abakene;
data.arabic: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

data.price: Mukarya mukuzako n’amatungo y’abandi mu bisigi;
data.arabic: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا

data.price: Mugakunda n’amatungo urukundo rurenze.
data.arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا

data.price: Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ntimwategerezwa kuba ukwo. Igihe rero isi yahondwahonzwe;
data.arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

data.price: Imana yawe Rurema Allah na Yo, Ikaza gutunganiriza ibiremwa, abamalayika na bo batonze ku murongo;
data.arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا

data.price: Umuriro wa Jahannamu na wo kuri uwo musi, ugashirwa ahabona; uwo musi, umuntu w’umugarariji azokwikebuka yibuke kwigaya, ariko rero ukwo kwibuka akigaya, nta co kuzomumarira.
data.arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

data.price: Azovuga yicuza ati: “Ubona iyo nkora nkiri kw’isi ivyomfasha muri ubu buzima bwanje bw’inyuma yo gupfa!”.
data.arabic: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي

data.price: Kuri uwo musi rero, nta wuzohana umuhakanyi bikwiye nk’igihano c’Imana Allah.
data.arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

data.price: Kandi nta wuzoboha nk’Imana Allah mu kudadira umuhakanyi.
data.arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

data.price: Iyo umwemeramana apfuye, abwirwa ati: “Ewe mutima utekanishijwe n’ininahaza n’itaziramana hamwe n’ukwemera Imana Allah!
data.arabic: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ

data.price: Subira ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah wishimiye impera yayo, wishimiwe n’Iyakuremye Allah;
data.arabic: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ

data.price: Uheze winjire rero mu mugwi w’abaja banje beranda;
data.arabic: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي

data.price: Winjire no mu Bwami bwanje bw’ijuru”.
data.arabic: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri iki gisagara ceranda ca Makka!
data.arabic: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

data.price: Kikaba ari na co wewe Intumwa Muhamadi urekuriwe gukoreramwo ico ushatse[1].
data.arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
data.footnotes: [1] Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yarekuriwe gukorera mu gisagara ca Makka ico ishatse, harimwo n’indwano mu kiringo kitarenga isaha imwe ku mutaga. Iyi Aayah, irerekana ko Intumwa (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), izokwigarurira ico gisagara habanje kuba indwano.

data.price: Ndarahiye kandi no ku kiremwa kivyara (ari co Adamu) n’ikivyarwa (mu rwaruka rwiwe)!
data.arabic: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ

data.price: Ko mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah Twaremye, ikiremwa-muntu kizohura n’umuruho ku wundi kw’isi kugeza gupfa.
data.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ

data.price: Mbega umuntu kubera amatungo yegeranije, yibaza ko ata wuzoshobora kumugonda!
data.arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

data.price: Avuga yihaya ngo: “Naratanze amatungo menshi cane!”.
data.arabic: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا

data.price: Mbega, yibaza ko ata n’umwe amubona akazomuhera ku vyo yakoze, vyaba bike canke vyinshi!
data.arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

data.price: Mbega, Twebwe Allah Ntitwamuhaye amaso abiri abonesha!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ

data.price: Tumuha n’ururimi hamwe n’iminwa ibiri, kugira ashobore gutomora ijambo!
data.arabic: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ

data.price: Dutako Turamumenyesha Tumutomorera inzira zibiri, iy’iciza n’iy’ikibi, kugira ngo yihitiremwo!
data.arabic: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ

data.price: Mbega, ubwo ntiyotanga amatungo yiwe akabona kuruhuka umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa!
data.arabic: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ

data.price: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umuruho wo mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’icowugukiza!
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ

data.price: Ni uguha umugurano w’umwemeramana ubwigenge;
data.arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

data.price: Canke ugufungurira mu gihe c’inzara izura inzara;
data.arabic: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ

data.price: Impfuvyi ya hafi mu muryango[2];
data.arabic: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
data.footnotes: [2] Ugaheza ukaronka indishi zo gutanga imperezwa n’izo kwunga ubuvandimwe.

data.price: Canke umworo ata co yimariye (ata gira shinge na rugero).
data.arabic: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ

data.price: Inyuma yo gukora ivyo vyose, umuntu akaba ari mu bemeramana, bahanurana kwihanganira kwumvira Imana Allah no kutayigabitanyiriza, bakanahanurana kugirira impuhwe ibiremwa.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

data.price: Abo barangwa n’ivyo rero, ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’iburyo, bazoruhukira mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
data.arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ

data.price: Nayo abagararije Aayah zacu za Qor’ani, abo ni bo bantu bo mu ruhande rw’ibubamfu;
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

data.price: Bazoba bapfundikiriwe mu muriro ubakikuje ku mpande zose.
data.arabic: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku zuba no ku muco waryo mu gitondo!
data.arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

data.price: No ku kwezi iyo gukurikiye izuba rirenze n’iyo riserutse!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

data.price: No ku murango iyo hakeye, umwijima w’ijoro ugaherengetera!
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

data.price: No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse isi hakijima!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا

data.price: No kw’ijuru n’ukuntu ryubatse!
data.arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

data.price: No kw’isi n’ukuntu ishashe, kugira ibiremwa bishobore kuyibako!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

data.price: No ku mushaha w’ikiremwa ico ari co cose n’ukuntu watunganijwe n’Imana Allah!
data.arabic: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

data.price: Igaheza Ikawumenyesha mu kuwutomorera inzira y’inabi n’iy’ineza!
data.arabic: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا

data.price: Ni ukuri yaratsinze, uwejeje umushaha agakora ivyiza.
data.arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

data.price: Kandi ni ukuri yarahomvye ubuzima bwiwe, uwasibije umushaha agakora ivyaha.
data.arabic: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

data.price: Bene Thamuudi barahakanye Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), kubera ukwimonogoza kwabo mu gukora ivyaha;
data.arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ

data.price: Igihe hiyadukiza inkozi y’ikibi muri bo[1] kugira ice imitsi ingamiya;
data.arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
data.footnotes: [1] Yitwa Kubaru mwene Salifu.

data.price: Intumwa y’Imana Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), iraheza ibabwira iti: “Mwoye gukomakoma ingamiya yarungitswe n’Imana Allah, mwiyubare kuyivogera ku musi wayo yagenewe gushoka kunywa”.
data.arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

data.price: Maze barayigarariza batako baraca imitsi ya nya ngamiya. Imana yabo Rurema Allah Ica Irabahana, Irabahonya bose ata n’umwe arokotse, kubera ibicumuro vyabo.
data.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

data.price: Kandi Imana Allah, ntitinya inkurikizi z’ibihano Yabahaye.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibintu vyose kw’isi!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ

data.price: No ku murango iyo hakeye, hakabona!
data.arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

data.price: No kw’irema ry’igitsina-gabo n’igitsina-gore!
data.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ

data.price: Bantu! Mu vy’ukuri ibikorwa vyanyu biri kwinshi; muri mwebwe harimwo uwukorera isi, hakabamwo n’uwukorera ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
data.arabic: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ

data.price: Uwo wese rero azotanga atiziganya mu matungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, akanagamburuka;
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

data.price: Akanemera ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH[1]”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;
data.arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
data.footnotes: [1] Nta mana ibwirijwe gusengwa vy’ukuri atari Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

data.price: Uyo rero Twebwe Allah, Tuzomworohereza mu buzima bwo kw’isi, Tunamushoboze gukora ivyiza bimushikana mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: Nayo uwuzoba ingumyi mu gutanga, ntanakenere indishi ku Mana Allah;
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ

data.price: Agahakana n’ijambo “LAA ILAAHA ILLA LLAAH”, ivyo ryigisha, ivyo risaba n’indishi zaryo;
data.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

data.price: Uyo, Twebwe Allah Tuzomworohereza gukora ibimushikana ku magorwa yo mu muriro udahera;
data.arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ

data.price: Amatungo yiwe, nta n’ico azomumarira igihe yahanantukiye mu muriro udahera.
data.arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Tujejwe kwerekana inzira igororotse iganisha mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
data.arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ

data.price: Kandi mu vy’ukuri, ni Twe Tugaba Tukaganza ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa n’ubwo kw’isi.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: Ni na co gituma Ndababuriye - bantu - Ndanabatinyisha n’ibihano vyo mu muriro ururumba.
data.arabic: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ

data.price: Nta wuwinjiramwo ubutavayo atari uwimonogoje mu bugarariji;
data.arabic: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

data.price: Uwuhakana Umuvugishwamana Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), agaheza akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

data.price: Hazokwegezwa kure y’uwo muriro, uwugamburukira Imana Allah bikwiye;
data.arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى

data.price: Uwutanga amatungo yiwe ku bw’Imana Allah, arondera kubandanya yiyeza;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

data.price: Kandi nta n’umwe agirira ineza mu ntumbero yo gusubirizwa mu ndumane;
data.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

data.price: Ariko agira ineza arondera gushimwa n’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, Nyenicubahiro-ntangere.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

data.price: Kandi nta kibuza ko azoshima impera n’inema zayo mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe c’umutaga!
data.arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

data.price: No kw’ijoro iyo ripfutse ibiremwa bigaturura!
data.arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

data.price: Ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Itaguhevye Muvugishwamana; kandi ko Itanagushavuriye ku guteba kw’ihishurirwa rya Qor’ani.
data.arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

data.price: Nta nkeka rero ko ubuzima bwawe bw’inyuma yo gupfa, ari bwiza kurusha ubwo kw’isi.
data.arabic: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

data.price: Kandi nta nkeka ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah, Izoguha vyinshi uzoheza ugashima.
data.arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ

data.price: Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Imana Allah ntiyagusanze uri impfuvyi, Ikakubungabunga!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

data.price: Igusanga utazi ico ari co Igitabu, n’ico ari co ukwemera! Iraheza Irakwigisha ivyo utari uzi, Inagushoboza gukora n'ivyiza bitegetswe!
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ

data.price: Igusanga ukenye maze Iragukenura, Iguha ukwihangana no kubumbwa n’ivyo ufise!
data.arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ

data.price: Kubera ivyo rero, ntukaryagumbe impfuvyi ngo uyihahaze.
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ

data.price: Nayo uwusavye gufashwa canke kwigishwa, ntukamuburabuze, ahubwo muhe unamutunganirize;
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ

data.price: Nayo inema z’Imana yawe Rurema Allah, ziyage ushima.
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ

data.price: Muvugishwamana! Mbega, Twebwe Allah, ntitwakwaguriye igikiriza cawe mu kuguha ukwihangana, kugira ushobore kwakira ubutumwa no kubushikiriza!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ

data.price: Turaheza Tugukurako umutwaro (w’uko abantu bawe warungitsweko batotumbera inzira)!
data.arabic: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ

data.price: Umutwaro wari uremereye umugongo wawe;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ

data.price: Gutyo, ku kubera imigenzo myiza wahawe, Tukudugiriza icubahiro.
data.arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ

data.price: Ntuzobuzwe rero n’ibangamirwa ry’abakwanka, gushikiriza ubutumwa. Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.
data.arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا

data.price: Burya mu vy’ukuri, akaga n’agahengwe biragendana.
data.arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا

data.price: Kubera ivyo rero, iyo uhejeje gutunganya ibikenewe mu vy’isi, senga ushimire Imana Allah;
data.arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ

data.price: Unatakambe cane urondera ibiri ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah.
data.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kuri “Tiini” na “Zayituuni[1]” (vyahezagiwe)!
data.arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ
data.footnotes: [1] Tiini na Zayituuni, ni ubwoko bw'ivyamwa.

data.price: No ku musozi wa Sinayi, ari na ho Intumwa Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah), yavuganiye n’Imana Allah ukuri kwamye!
data.arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

data.price: No kuri iki gisagara ca Makka gitekanye!
data.arabic: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ

data.price: Ni ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twaremye umuntu mw’ishusho ryiza cane;
data.arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

data.price: Hanyuma Tumusubiza mu muriro udahera, mu gihe atokwumvira Imana Allah agakurikira n’Intumwa zayo.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ

data.price: Ariko rero abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa bakanakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe impembo itagabanijwe, idahera.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

data.price: Muntu! None ni igiki gituma inyuma y’ivyo vyose, uhakana wivuye inyuma umusi w’impera!
data.arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.price: Mbega burya Imana Allah, Yategekanije umusi wo gutunganiriza ibiremwa, si Yo Nyene kugira ubutungane bubereye ku biremwa vyayo gusumba abacamanza bose! Yobuzwa n’iki! Ego cane, ni Yo!
data.arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

data.price: Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, maze utangure kw’izina ry’Imana yawe Allah Yaremye;
data.arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ

data.price: Yaremye zina kiremwa-muntu mu maraso avuze.
data.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ

data.price: Muvugishwamana! Soma ivyo wahishuriwe muri Qor’ani, wizeye ko Imana yawe Rurema Allah ari Yo Mugiraneza-ntangere;
data.arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ

data.price: Yigishije ibiremwa kwandika n’ikaramu;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ

data.price: Yigishije kiremwa-muntu ivyo kitari kizi, Iraheza Igikura mu muzimagiza w’ubujuju Igishira mu muco w’ubumenyi.
data.arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ

data.price: Si ivy’imbeshere ko umuntu yama yarenze ku mabwirizwa y’Imana Allah ku bwishime;
data.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ

data.price: Abitewe n'uko abonye yamaze kwikenura agatunga;
data.arabic: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri uburuhukiro bwiwe, ni ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah, Izomuhembera ivyo yakoze.
data.arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ

data.price: Mbega, warabonye igitangaje kurusha umuntu[1] aburabuza;
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ
data.footnotes: [1] Ni umuhakanyi yarwanije cane Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), yitwa Abu Jahli.

data.price: Umuja[2] w’Imana Allah mu gihe ariko arasenga!
data.arabic: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
data.footnotes: [2] Yaburabuje umuja w’Imana Muhamadi gusenga.

data.price: Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuzwa ugusenga, yoba ari mu nzira igororotse!
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ

data.price: Canke akaba ariko arabwiriza gukora iciza c'igamburukiramana!
data.arabic: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ

data.price: Mbega, ubona gute mu gihe uyo aburabuza ugusenga, yoba ahakana ubutumwa, akagenza umugongo yirengagiza ukwemera Allah!
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

data.price: Mbega, ntazi neza ko Imana Allah Ibona ivyo akora!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

data.price: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri, ataretse kurwanya Intumwa, Tuzomufatira mu ruhanga, maze Tumujungunyire mu muriro;
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

data.price: Uruhanga rw’umubeshi, umunyavyaha;
data.arabic: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ

data.price: Arahamagara rero abateramyi biwe baze bamutabare;
data.arabic: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

data.price: Na Twe Allah, Tuzoheza Duhamagare abamalayika b’ibihangange “Al-Zabaaniya”;
data.arabic: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Nateshwe ate, arahumba mu kwibaza ko azoguturatuza. Ntukamwumvire ngo ureke gusenga, tsimbatara ku kwubamira Imana Allah, uheze ubandanye uyiyegereze unikundwakaze kuri Yo.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Twamanuye Qor’ani mw’ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere mu kwezi kwa Ramadhani.
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

data.price: Ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere, ni ijoro iciza gikozwe muri ryo, gisumba mu ndishi iciza gikozwe mu mezi igihumbi atagiramwo iryo joro[1].
data.arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
data.footnotes: [1] Iyo ni impano, Imana Allah Yageneye gusa abantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

data.price: Muri ryo, hamanuka abamalayika ku bwinshi bari kumwe na Mutimamweranda Jibrili, kw’itegeko ry’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, bagaheza bakerekwa n’ivyagezwe vyose vyo muri uwo mwaka.
data.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

data.price: Iryo joro rero, ni amahoro masa gushika umutwenzi ukitse.
data.arabic: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ

data.price: Abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu no mu babangikanyamana, ntibari kugera aho bavavanura n’ubugarariji, kugeza bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka;
data.arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

data.price: Ico cemeza, ni Intumwa ivuye ku Mana Allah, yaje ibasomera Qor’ani yanditswe ku mpapuro zitagiramwo agasembwa, zisukuye.
data.arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

data.price: Harimwo ibimenyetso n’amategeko atomoye, arongora mu nzira igororotse.
data.arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ

data.price: Abahawe Igitabu, ntibiciyemwo imigwi ku vyerekeye ukwemera umuzo w’Intumwa Muhamadi[1], kiretse inyuma y’aho bashikiriwe n’icemeza kiboneka, cemeza ko Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana), ari yo Ntumwa y’Imana Allah basezeraniwe mu Bitabu vyabo.
data.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
data.footnotes: [1] Abahawe Igitabu, bari basanzwe bazi neza ibiranga Intumwa igiye kuza, baranemera ko ari Intumwa y’ukuri bisunze ibiyiranga, ariko iyo Ntumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana) imaze kuza, bariciyemwo imigwi; muri bo hari abayemeye baranayikurikira, hari n’abayihakanye baranayirwanya biturutse kw’ishari n’akarenganyo.

data.price: Nta n’ikindi bategetswe gukora mu mabwirizwa bahawe, atari ukwiyegereza Imana Allah mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenga ari Imwe Rudende, beze idini ryayo batayibangikanya, batsimbataze n’amasengesho ku mwanya, banatange n’ishikanwa-bwirizwa. Iryo rero, ni ryo dini ry’ukuri, ni na bwo bwislamu.
data.arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, abagararije mu bahawe Igitabu n’ababangikanyamana, bazohanwa mu muriro wa Jahannamu, bazowubamwo ibihe bidahera. Abo rero, ni bo babi cane mu biremwa.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, abemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe; abo rero, ni bo beza cane mu biremwa;
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

data.price: Impembo yabo ku Mana yabo Rurema Allah, ni imirima itotahaye yo mu Bwami bw’ijuru rya “Adeni”, musi y’inyubakwa n’ibiti vyabwo hatemba inzuzi, bazobubamwo ibihe bidahera, mu nema zamaho. Imana Allah Yarabashimiye ku vyo bakoze, na bo nyene barayishimiye ku mpera Yabageneye. Iyo, ni yo mpembo y’uwatinye gucumura ku Mana yiwe Rurema Allah.
data.arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ

data.price: Igihe isi yanyiganyijwe nya kunyiganyizwa;
data.arabic: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا

data.price: Maze isi igasohora ibiri muri yo vyose; abapfuye hamwe n’ubutare;
data.arabic: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا

data.price: Umuntu akicwa n’ubwoba n’akantu abaza ati: “Mbega yemwe! Isi yashikiwe n’iki?”.
data.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا

data.price: Uwo musi, isi izoshikiriza inkuru z’ivyayikoreweko vyose; vyaba ivyiza canke ibibi;
data.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا

data.price: Kuko Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yayitegetse.
data.arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا

data.price: Uwo musi, abantu bazozuka bari imigwimigwi, kugira berekwe n’Imana Allah ibikorwa vyabo, Inabibahembere.
data.arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

data.price: Uwo wese rero akora iciza n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, azobona indishi yaco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
data.arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

data.price: N’uwukora ikibi n’aho coba kingana n’akanyegeri, na co nyene azobona igihano caco mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
data.arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye kw’ifarasi zirukanga zihezuka mu gutera umwansi ku rugamba rwo guharanira Imana Allah!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا

data.price: N’iziruka ibinono bigacira amasase!
data.arabic: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا

data.price: N’izitera umwansi mu gitondo!
data.arabic: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا

data.price: Maze zigasura intumo mu kwiruka!
data.arabic: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا

data.price: Zigana hagati y’abansi!
data.arabic: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu ni intashima y’inema z’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah.
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri na we nyene kuri ivyo, ni icabona.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, umuntu mu gukunda amatungo ararengeje.
data.arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

data.price: Mbega umuntu ntazi ibizoba bimurindiriye, igihe Imana Allah Yazuye abapfuye bava mu mva zabo kugira baharurirwe;
data.arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

data.price: Hakanerekanwa n’ibiri mu mishaha (ivyiza canke ibibi)!
data.arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri Imana yabo Rurema, kuri uwo musi, Irazi neza ivyo bakoze, nta na kimwe Iyobewe.
data.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ

data.price: Umusi nkuramutima.
data.arabic: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: Mbega, ni igiki umusi nkuramutima?
data.arabic: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: Ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co umusi nkuramutima?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

data.price: Ni umusi, abantu bazozuka batagira iyo baja n’iyo bava, bashwiragiye nk’ibinyugunyugu bishwiragijwe;
data.arabic: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ

data.price: N’imisozi ikaba nk’ubwoya bw’isufi[1] busanzajwe, butumuriwe hejuru n’umuyaga.
data.arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ
data.footnotes: [1] Isufi, ni ubwoya bw'intama canke ubw’agakwavu.

data.price: Uwo wese rero, ivyiza vyiwe bizoremera ku munzani;
data.arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.price: Uyo, ni we azoba mu buzima bushimishije mu Bwami bw’ijuru.
data.arabic: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ

data.price: Nayo uwo ivyiza vyiwe bizohwahuka ku munzani;
data.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

data.price: Uyo rero, uburuhukiro bwiwe ni mu manga ihonya.
data.arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ

data.price: Mbega none, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co imanga ihonya?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ

data.price: Ni umuriro udahera, ururumba.
data.arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ

data.price: Mwasamajwe n'ukwihaya ku bwinshi bw’amatungo n’ibibondo, muraheza mureka kugamburukira Imana Allah!
data.arabic: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

data.price: Mugashishikara gusamazwa n’ivyo, gushika n’aho mushengereye mugahambwa mu mva.
data.arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ

data.price: Nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Ivyo ntibikwiye kubasamaza namba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya ko ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa ari bwo bwiza kuri mwebwe.
data.arabic: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

data.price: Eka nimuteshwe mute, murahumba! Nimwikebuke, ubu vuba bwango muzomenya inkurikizi mbi z’ukutumvira Imana Allah.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

data.price: Eka nimuteshwe mute! Iyo mumenya vy’ukuri ibibafitiye akamaro, mworetse kwihaya ku vy’isi, mukihutira nyabuna gukora ivyiza.
data.arabic: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

data.price: Ni ukuri muzobona umuriro ururumba.
data.arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ

data.price: Kandi ni ukuri, muzowubona ukuri kwamye.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

data.price: Hanyuma, ni ukuri kuri uwo musi w’impera, muzobazwa ku nema z’ubwoko bwose ico mwazikoresheje.
data.arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

data.price: Jewe Allah, Ndarahiye ku gihe, kubera ibitangaza birimwo vyerekana ubushobozi bwanje!
data.arabic: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ

data.price: Ko mu vy’ukuri, zina kiremwa-muntu kiri mu ruhombo;
data.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ

data.price: Kiretse abemeye Imana Allah bagakora n'ivyiza bitegetswe, bagahanurana no kwama bashigikiye bagendera ukuri, bakanahanurana kwihangana muri ivyo vyose.
data.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

data.price: Uguhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’uwo wese anegura akandagaza abantu, akwiragiza insaku (gateranya);
data.arabic: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ

data.price: Yishinga kwegeranya amatungo no kuyaharura kenshi.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

data.price: Mbega yibaza ko amatungo yiwe azomubeshaho ibihe bidahera akanamukingira iharurirwa!
data.arabic: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ

data.price: Nateshwe ate, arahumba! Ni ukuri uyo muntu, azojugunywa muri ruyonza.
data.arabic: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ

data.price: Ntumwa y'Imana! Mbega, ni igiki cokumenyesha ico ari co ruyonza?
data.arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ

data.price: Ni umuriro w’Imana Allah wama wegenyejwe;
data.arabic: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ

data.price: Unyengetera mu mishaha.
data.arabic: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, uwo muriro urabakikuje mu mpande zose;
data.arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ

data.price: Bazoba baboheshejwe iminyororo miremire n’amapingu; ntibazocaruka na gato.
data.arabic: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Mbega, ntiwamenye ingene Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yagize beninzovu[1]!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ
data.footnotes: [1] Abraha Al-Habashiy, umutware wo muri Etiyopiya n’ingabo ziwe, igihe bashaka gusenyura Al-Ka’ba.

data.price: Umugambi wabo mubi, ntiyawugize impfagusa ukaburizwamwo!
data.arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ

data.price: Iraheza Ibarungikira inyoni ziri mu migwimigwi;
data.arabic: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ

data.price: Zibatera amabuye yokeje, ziraheza zirabahonya.
data.arabic: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ

data.price: Maze Ibagira nk’ivyatsi vyarishijwe n'intungwa hanyuma iravyuza, iraheza ibita ari amahenehene.
data.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ

data.price: Kubera akamenyero k’Abakorayishi;
data.arabic: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ

data.price: Akamenyero kabo ko kuja mu gihugu ca Yemeni kiri mu bumanuko mu rushana, no kuja mu bihugu vyo muri Shaamu biri mu buraruko mu ci, aho baja kurangura ibidandazwa, bakishira bakizana ata nkomanzi.
data.arabic: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ

data.price: Kubera ivyo rero, nibashimire Imana Rurema Nyene iyi ngoro ntagatifu (Al-Ka’ba), babaye hambavu yayo batekaniwe; baheze bayiyegereze mu vyo bakora vyose banayisenge ari Imwe Rudende;
data.arabic: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ

data.price: Yo Yabafunguriye Ikabakiza inzara, Ikabaha n’umutekano, Ikanabakiza ubwoba.
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

data.price: Mbega warabonye uwuhakana yivuye inyuma, izuka ry’ibiremwa n’impera yavyo ku musi w’izuka?
data.arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

data.price: Uyo, ni uwuryagumba agahahaza impfuvyi, agahonyanga agateka kayo ku karenganyo;
data.arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

data.price: Ntanahimirize gufungurira abakene, nkeswe kubafungurira we nyene.
data.arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

data.price: Burya guhanwa nya guhanwa, ni ukw’abasenga mu buryarya;
data.arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ

data.price: Abirengagiza amasengesho yabo mu kutayasengera ku mwanya wayo no mu kutubahiriza ibisabwa vyayo;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ

data.price: Abiyerekana mu vyo bakora kugira bashimwe n’abantu;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ

data.price: Bakanimana mu kudatizanya utumaramuziro[1].
data.arabic: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ
data.footnotes: [1] Bananiwe kuba abagwaneza mu gusenga Imana Allah, bananirwa no kuba abagwaneza ku biremwa.

data.price: Muvugishwamana! Mu vy’ukuri, Twarakweguriye impano y’ivyiza vyinshi nta ngere kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa[1].
data.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ
data.footnotes: [1] Muri ivyo vyiza, ni uruzi “Kawthar” ruri mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ku nkengera zarwo hari amahema yubatswe mu butare bw’agaciro “lulu”, umusenyi wo muri rwo, ni “miski”.

data.price: Kubera ivyo rero, senga wamizeko wongere ukerere kw’izina ry’Imana no ku bw’Imana yawe Rurema Allah.
data.arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ

data.price: Mu vy’ukuri, uwugucokora akanka n’uburongozi warungikanwe, ni we yacitswe n’ivyiza vyose, kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
data.arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Emwe bagarariji!
data.arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

data.price: Jewe sinzosenga ivyo musenga (ibigirwamana).
data.arabic: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

data.price: Na mwe ntimusenga Imana Imwe Rudende nsenga.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ

data.price: Eka nanje sinsenga uko mwebwe musenga.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ

data.price: Kandi na mwe ntimuzosenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah[1] nsenga.
data.arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ
data.footnotes: [1] Iyi Aayah, yahishuwe ku nkuru ya bamwe mu bagarariji bazwi ku mazina, Imana Allah Yari Izi ko batazopfa bemeye Imana Imwe Rudende Allah.

data.price: Mufise idini ryanyu rero, nanje nkagira idini ryanje ntarota mpindura”.
data.arabic: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Igihe habonetse intsinzi y’Imana Allah ugatsinda ababangikanyamana mu Bakorayishi, ugaheza ugahabuza igisagara ca Makka;
data.arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ

data.price: Ukabona n’abantu binjira mw’idini ry’Imana Allah ry’ubwislamu ari benshi mu migwimigwi;
data.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

data.price: Aho rero, uraca witegurira kurengutswa n’Imana Allah, uheze uninahaze ushimagize Imana yawe Rurema Allah, wongere uyisabe kenshi ikigongwe. Mu vy’ukuri, Yo Yamye Yumvira cane abigaya.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

data.price: Yarahonye Abu Lahabi, aragahona ku kubera ukubangamira kwiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
data.arabic: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ

data.price: Amatungo yiwe, eka n’abana biwe, nta co bizomumarira ngo bimukingire ibihano vy’Imana Allah.
data.arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

data.price: Azokwinjira mu muriro ururumba cane, maze awote;
data.arabic: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ

data.price: Ari kumwe n’umugore wiwe (Ummu Jamiila), yahora yikorera amahwa akayatega mu nzira Intumwa y’Imana (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah) icamwo;
data.arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ

data.price: Uyo mukenyezi, azotabwa mu muriro aboheshejwe mw’izosi ikiziriko gitsivye neza.
data.arabic: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Imana Allah, ni Imwe Rudende mu bumana bwayo, mu bushobozi bwo kurema no mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo.
data.arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

data.price: Imana Allah, ni Yo Nyenugutumberwa muri vyose.
data.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

data.price: Ntiyavyaye kandi ntiyavyawe, eka ntigira n’umugore.
data.arabic: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ

data.price: Kandi ntigira ikiremwa na kimwe bisa canke bisusa, haba mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, haba no mu bushobozi bwayo”.
data.arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mana Allah, Umuremyi w’igitondo;
data.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ

data.price: Inkingire inabi y’ivyo Yaremye vyose;
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

data.price: N’inabi y’ijoro iyo ryijimye;
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

data.price: N’inabi y’abarozikazi bahuha mu mapfundo mu kuroga;
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ

data.price: N’inabi y’umunyeshari[1] iyo asharitse”.
data.arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
data.footnotes: [1] Umunyeshari, ni umuntu asharika abandi abahora impano bahawe n’Imana Allah, akipfuza ko nya mpano zohona, akanababangamira mu buzima.

data.price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Vuga uti: “Ndikinze ku Mubungabunzi w’abantu bose;
data.arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: Umwami Mugabe w’abantu, Yikenuye;
data.arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: Imana Nyene gusengwa n’abantu, ata yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa atari Yo;
data.arabic: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: Inkingire inabi ya shetani itera amazinda kenshi iyo umuntu agoswe, ikanyegera iyo aninahaje Imana Allah;
data.arabic: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ

data.price: Itera amazinda n’amakenga mu mitima y’abantu, ikabosha gukora ibibi no kureka ibitegetswe;
data.arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

data.price: Ikomoka mu bwoko bw’Amajini n’ubw’abantu”.
data.arabic: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ

chapters: She that is to be Examined
